isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - OWL (OIL WATER LAMP) / EWPS (ENGINE WARNING AND PROTECTION SYSTEM) - SIGNAL FUNCTIONS

svcproc.title: SIGNAL FUNCTIONS
svcproc.para: The red Oil and Water Lamp and the Engine Alarm Buzzer are intended to be turned on when conditions are present that will cause impending damage to the engine. The level of protection is dependent upon which EWPS (Engine Warning and Protection) are turned on in the ECM. (See Extended Description). When ignition switch is in the ON position power is available at the OWL lamp and alarm. The lamp and the alarm are turned ON when the ECM provides a path to ground.
